patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses: Vidyavardhini's College of Engineering and Technology has been offering Computer Engineering, CSE, AI among others for Bachelors Degree of Engineering. VCET has been offering the specialization in Hons. for AIML, IoT and other courses

patterns: how long will be the B.E. course

responses: Our college offers 4 year long B.E course for all the brances.

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: VCET is located in Vasai West - 401202

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 5 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: Academic Levelshould be good and overall aggregate of 60% or above with each subject should be maintained.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There would be six to seven classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses: Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Mumbai.
There are exams which carry more weight than class Internal Assesments. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports fest: Avahan, Cultural Fest: Zeal and different fests and competitions, among respective committees. 
 Also our college has badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, seminar hall, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: how much is the college fee
responses: Course Admission fee=RS 1,15,000 / Year 1 University including Exam fee
